means: 不安， （对某事是否正确感到的）疑虑( qualm的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: He had no qualms about cheating the tax inspector.
sentence.Network_cn: 对欺骗税务稽查员一事,他并不觉得有什么不安.

sentence.Network_en: He has no qualms about lying.
I've got no qualms about lowering myself to Lemmer's level to get what I want.
sentence.Network_cn: 为得到我想要的东西，我一点都不忌讳把自己降格到跟莱麦尔一样。

PerfectNetExp.abs: If he had had any qualms , they would have been practical., 假如他曾有过什么不安的话 , 他们就会讲究实际了.
board：布告牌；电子公告栏qualms：良心之谴责；不安分享：
She went off the Black Pool Conference without qualms ., 她离开布莱克普尔会议时 , 毫无不安之感.
despite my qualms , i took the job尽管有些疑虑，我还是接受了那份工作

list.abs: He would have no qualms about using missiles to unleash a nuclear war ., 他会毫无顾忌地利用火箭发动一场核战争.
treating asymptomatic carriers of hiv causes greater qualms if it brings no benefit to the people actually taking the medicine .如果治疗已接受这种药物的无症状的艾滋病病毒携带者没有产生效益，会导致更大的疑虑。
to have no qualms about doing sth ., 对于做某事毫无疑虑.

last night , he had no such qualms , saying a recession was likely because the financial crisis had come on top of the rise in oil prices already squeezed in-comes .昨夜，他不再有这些疑虑，称英国有可能步入衰退，因为在造成收入减少的油价上涨之后，又出现了金融危机。

entry.def: If you have no qualms about doing something, you are not worried that it may be wrong in some way.

example.ex: I have no qualms about recommending this approach...
example.tran: 我会毫不犹豫地推荐这一方法。

example.ex: Did she see her husband as capable of murder? She had used the word without a qualm.
example.tran: 她觉得自己的丈夫可能杀人吗？在使用这个字眼的时候，她没有丝毫的不安。

auth_sentence.content: But the property developer had no qualms about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the property developer had no qualms about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the property developer had no qualms about it.

auth_sentence.content: No qualms to interfere with appetite.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No qualms to interfere with appetite.

auth_sentence.content: Clandestine encounters would have been easy and not as subject to moral qualms.
auth_sentence.res_content: Clandestine encounters would have been easy and not as subject to moral qualms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Clandestine encounters would have been easy and not as subject to moral qualms.
